reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress gorgeous and appreciate its perfect fit, stretchiness, and comfort. The fabric is thick and soft, with one customer noting how it hugs the body in all the right places. They like its quality, with one mentioning it's perfect for weddings and cocktail parties.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional!
items.body: Gorgeous thick material and moderate stretch. I’m 5’5”, 145 lbs, 65 yrs old with hour glass figure. The large fit perfectly. I removed the top bow of the two on each shoulder. Very elegant for my mother of bride dress. The champagne color is exquisite with rose gold jewelry & shoes. Bargain price for such a beautiful dress! Read more
items.author: Phyllis Silbernagel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this! In every color!
items.body: Comfy, sexy, stretchy and thick enough to not be cheap feeling. I am 5’6” 155ish with a thicker middle. The large fit like a glove. I felt like a million bucks at my holiday charity event! But it! In every color! I also bought the red in a medium at the same time, but it was tight in the middle so I shipped it back. Considering repurchasing the rd for next year!! I got a ton of compliments and felt fabulous! Read more
items.author: Jodygirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning dress feels great on!
items.body: 100% recommend this dress. It’s stunning on. Pictures do not do it justice. I received so many compliments to my nephews wedding. For reference I’m 5’7 weight 145 bust 38D I ordered the red in large and it fit great in the bust/top but was a bit large in the tummy area. The fabric is soft and very comfortable. Read more
items.author: Bert and Dorothy buckman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning, Comfortable and Elegant!
items.body: This dress is a 10/10! Very comfortable, hugs your body in all the right places, elegant and sexy all in one. The length is perfect and the slit is very flattering. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars stomach rouche is not flattering
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I wanted to like this, but the rouching in the front is just not flattering. The dress size is large, I can go between medium and large but usually choose large because of my chest. I don't have much of a tummy but the rouching at the stomach and hip made it look like I have much more than I do. The rest of the dress I liked, I picked it because I liked the frilly shoulder bits, which are well done, I still like them. Other than the stomach my other complaint is that I'm not a fan of the white mesh at the cleavage, black mesh would be more cohesive, but that isn't anything a few moments with a sharpie couldn't fix in a pinch. The tailoring of the dress is good, seams match up evenly and the fabric is good thick quality. Zipper pulled smoothly and no issues pulling it past the waist seam like I have had in other dresses. The black is true black. Read more
items.author: D'Anemone

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tight on top, very loose in belly
items.body: Lovely dress! It's VERY tight in the chest, I don't wear bras so that might help with the squishing but my poor girls were flattened, and I'm maybe a b-c cup. The "invisible" modestly panel is a bit too white for me, I might end up trimming it out. I had to double check that this wasn't a maternity dress as there is a LOT of ruched fabric around the belly, but I appreciate that it's very flattering, hugs my curves perfectly, just hugs the girls into near oblivion. I personally think it looks better off the shoulder, the shoulder bows are a bit bigger than I'd personally normally go for, but they work, esp off the shoulder. The side slit is perfect, and with a cute stretchy belt this dress is perfect for casual dates or fancier occasions. It seems very well made, fabric is very thick and it's fairly heavy as it's double lined. Would make a great fall/ winter dress! All in all I'm very happy with it, will just need to figure out how to get the girls to breathe! I'd say it's a great value for the quality Read more
items.author: Candi Megumi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Stunning!
items.body: Such a beautiful dress! The fit was perfect. Very good quality material for the price! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Va va Voom!
items.body: Amazing dress and so reasonably priced. I received many compliments. FYI Im in my 50s, enough said. Wore it to semi formal event. The fabric is top notch AND love, love the stretch in the fabric. It hugs nicely without overly compressing. I had to size down M to S. You will not be disappointed Would definitely buy another color. Read more
items.author: Paula C

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless Bodycon Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless Bodycon Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, A-apricot, Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
